short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter your availability in calendar view, then copy-paste it as sentences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop retyping your availability in emails every time. Use schedule2words instead! Enter your availability in an easy-to-use time block selector. It will be saved and ready for copy-paste for your future use. More features coming!
